name: Beepo & Pogo
description:
Welcome to Beepo and Pogo! Use their trusty magnets to lead the robots to safety!

Beepo and Pogo have large magnets on their heads. Line them up so the magnets are facing each other, and then press SPACEBAR to activate the magnets.  Can be played single-player or co-op!

Made during the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, this game is all about using your wits and the connection between the two robots to solve puzzles.

The Team:

Ben Brook- Game Designer/VFX/UI Programmer

Darrien Blanchard- Prop Modeler

Dylan Klimeck- Character Artist

Greg González- Motion Graphics

Joey Belt- Environment Artist

John Washington- Game/Systems Designer & Programmer

Phil Corrado- Game/Level Designer/Composer

Spencer Hamm- Animator & Rigger
